text.autoconfig.arcanespace.title: Arcane Space Configuration
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.oppos: When an entity's gravity direction changes to be Upside Down,
their total fall distance will be multiplied by this value.
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.other: When an entity's gravity direction changes to be Sideways,
their total fall distance will be multiplied by this value.
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.trans: Determines whether the gradual gravity transition is enabled.
True by default. False is instant and may fix some bugs.
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.rotat: Takes 1 second divided by this config value.
Defines how long in ticks gravity rotations take.
Extra ticks after rotation where gravity is locked.
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.gFiel: Defines the default size of G-Fields from a gravity focus.
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.voidC: Upper-Void Configuration
Extra configuration settings that control the upper-void in space.
This kills entities to prevent them from falling upwards forever.
Asphyxiation Height
Entities above this height gain an effect which makes them lose air,
Damage sustained is different from drowning, but undead are unaffected.
Bubbles Aid Asphyxiation
Allows bubble columns to restore air to those with asphyxiation,
False by default as I wanted Asphyxiation different from drowning.
Freezing Height
Entities above this height will get a freezing effect applied.
Currently, this effect only obscures the player's view.
BloodBoil Height
Entities above this height gain an effect which mimics
the rapid damage from falling out of the world.
Instant Death Height
Entities above this height die instantly.
Ticks Until Fully Frozen
Number of ticks it takes for the freezing screen effect
to reach maximum opacity. 1 tick = 1/20th of a second.
BloodBoil Damage
Damage taken each tick while blood is boiling.
4 would be the same as falling out of the bottom of the world.
Space Kills Gods
Determines whether the upper void can hurt creative players or not,
Set to true by default to mimic void damage when falling towards it.
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.gravi: Determines default gravity DIRECTION, 0 by default (DOWN)
Determines default gravity STRENGTH, 1.0 by default (100%)
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.visua: Visual Config
Extra Config Options related to how things display.
Due to their nature, these options can be changed
without restarting the game, so try them all!
Also includes extra visual features I couldn't fit in.
Spherical Singularity
Determines the model type of the singularity in Gravity Foci.
True is Spherical and False is Cubic. Set to False(Cubic) by
default as I feel spheres don't fit Minecraft's art style.
Focal Complexity
Determines the complexity of spherical gravity foci.
This option exists for performance reasons, and when set
to either a negative value or 0, the singularity is disabled.
Lower numbers are faster, Higher are slower; 6 is the default.
Shadow Effect
Determines if the shadow effect displays.
A shadow is a black glow in item backgrounds.
Glow Effect
Determines if the glow effect displays.
A glow is a colored glow in item backgrounds.
Pixelated Blur
Determines if the shadow effect is pixelated.
text.autoconfig.arcanespace.option.debug: Enables debug mode, you don't need this.
